@NonNullByDefault

Package com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp

Linear-programming based solver (requires external solver).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IntegerEquation.TermIterator
    Iterates over the terms of the linear equation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IntegerEquation
    Represents a linear equation with integer coefficients of the form:
    LPDiscrete
    Solver variable for Discrete variables under LP solver.
    LPFactorMarginalConstraint
    Represents a linear equality describing the constraint that the marginal probability of a particular value of a variable is equal to the sum of of the joint probabilities that include that variable value.
    LPFactorMarginalConstraint.TermIterator  
    LPOptions
    Options for linear programming (LP) based dimple solver.
    LPSolver  
    LPSolverGraph
    Solver-specific factor graph for LP solver.
    LPTableFactor
    Solver table factor under LP solver.
    LPVariableConstraint
    Represents a linear equality describing the constraint that the probabilities of a discrete random variable's values add up to one.
    LPVariableConstraint.TermIterator  
    MatlabConstraintTermIterator  
    SFactorGraph Deprecated
    Will be removed in future release.
    Solver
    References Message-Passing Algorithms for Packing and Covering Linear Programs with Zero-One Matrices
    STableFactor Deprecated
    Use LPTableFactor instead.
    SVariable Deprecated
    Use LPDiscrete instead.
